title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann: Parallel Works
synopsis: An anthology of animated shorts featuring characters from Gurren Lagann in alternative worlds. Every clip is animated by a particular animator of GAINAX.
related_anime: ['Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann: Parallel Works 2', 'Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann']
